Market Analysis & Business Model

Revenue Streams:

  • Transaction Fee: 5% commission on each sale.

  • Premium Subscription for Farmers: Product promotion and advanced

features for 10,000 - 30,000 CFA/month.

  • Targeted Advertising: Farmers can boost their offers at a cost of

5,000 - 50,000 CFA per campaign.
